aiPosts.title: AI-Generated Posts
aiPosts.description: Let AI help you create engaging posts from your activities. Posts are created as drafts for your review.
aiPosts.enableDescription: Allow AI to generate post drafts from your activities
aiPosts.styleDescription: Choose how AI describes your activities. You can change this per activity.
aiPosts.perspectiveDescription: Choose the narrative voice for your AI posts. Coach Mode shares as a coach or observer, My Story writes in your personal voice.
aiPosts.autoPublishDescription: Publish posts automatically without review (not recommended)

settings.deleteAccountConfirm: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
settings.deleteAccountWarning: Warning: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data including activities, posts, and events.
settings.passwordRequiredForDelete: Password is required to delete your account

commentary.timeWindowsHint: Restrict commentary to specific hours. Leave empty for always active.

loading.title: Generating Your Plan
loading.subtitle: Our AI is creating a personalized training program just for you. This usually takes 5-10 seconds.

weeksList.confirmAbandonMessage: This will permanently end your current training program. You can create a new one afterwards.
weeksList.confirmPauseMessage: Your program will be paused. You can resume it at any time.

weekDetail.confirmSkipMessage: Skip this week's training? This will move you to the next week.
weekDetail.weekCompletedMessage: Congratulations! You've completed this week's training. Keep up the great work!
weekDetail.confirmUnlinkMessage: Remove the link between this training activity and the recorded activity?

weekDetail.confirmReassignMessage: This activity is already linked to another training week. It will be moved to this week instead.
